main event: A round, disc-like silvery object was observed hovering in the sky in Madison, Wisconsin on April 3, 1965.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 15 minutes and was quite bright., The witness described the object as having no exhaust or tail and making no sound., The object was first sighted directly overhead and moved in various directions with no definite pattern., It turned bluish gray before disappearing from sight., The observer, a 39-year-old salesman, had a reliability estimate of good.
witness description: 39-year-old salesman, standing in yard looking up
